hint: A quick dash to your target.
description: Charge at the enemy, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and generating 1 Rage.
A vicious attack that deals damage and wounds the target, reducing all healing received by 50% for 10 sec.
Hurl a fiery ball that causes Fire damage and applies a burning DoT for 4 sec.
Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy, dealing Frost damage and reducing movement speed by 30% for 4 sec.
Stuns the target for 6 seconds.
Corrupts the target, causing Shadow damage over 14 seconds.
Smites an enemy for Holy damage.
Sends a bolt of dark magic at an enemy, causing Shadow damage.
Casts a bolt of lightning at the target, dealing Nature damage.
Teleports the caster 20 yards forward, freeing them from stuns and bonds.
The caster lets out a psychic scream, causing enemies within 8 yards to flee in fear for 8 seconds.
Summons a shadowy fiend to attack your enemy, restoring mana to you as it deals damage.
Blasts the target's mind for heavy Shadow damage.
Increases movement speed by 70% for 8 seconds.
Allows the rogue to vanish from sight, entering stealth even while in combat.
Calls down a bolt of shadow energy, stunning all enemies within the area for 3 seconds.

hint: Leap into the air and bombard enemies.
description: Launch into the air and bombard enemies with fel energy.
Activate to slip into the shadows, reducing the chance for enemies to detect your presence.
Increases the attack power of party and raid members.
Creates a Healthstone that can be used to instantly restore health.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Stormwind.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Ironforge.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Darnassus.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Stonard.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Orgrimmar.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Dazar'alor.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Dornogal.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Valdrakken.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Oribos.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Undercity.
Creates a portal, teleporting group members that use it to Silvermoon.
Launches all stored Arcane Charges at the enemy, dealing Arcane damage.
Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects that cause loss of control of your character.

hint: Massive haste buff for your group.
description: Increases haste by 30% for all party and raid members for 40 seconds.

hint: Massive haste buff for your group.
description: Increases haste by 30% for all party and raid members for 40 seconds.
Channeling mana regeneration, restoring a large amount of mana over 6 seconds.

hint: Deals damage and heals the caster.
description: Fires a blast of unholy energy at the target, causing Shadow damage and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt.
Empowers your rune weapon, instantly generating full runes and 25 Runic Power.
Increases damage reduction by 40% and grants immunity to interrupts and silence effects for 8 seconds.
Attempts to step through the shadows and appear behind your enemy, increasing movement speed for 2 sec.
Teleports the caster forward 20 yards, freeing them from all stuns and bonds.
Summons an image of Yu'lon that breathes healing mist onto injured allies.

hint: Little sip to reset some important cooldowns.
description: Instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.
Places a shield that reduces magic damage taken by party and raid members by 20%.
Redirects all damage you take to the attacker for 10 seconds.
Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast.
Grants 100% increased critical strike chance for your Fire spells for 10 seconds.

hint: Creates food and drink for allies.
description: Conjures a table of refreshments that restores health and mana.
Surround yourself with lightning, dealing damage to attackers when hit.
Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and spells for 10 seconds.
Counters the enemy's spell, preventing any spell from that school from being cast for 6 seconds.
Heals a friendly target and the caster at the same time.
A wave of Chi energy bounces between allies and enemies, healing allies and damaging enemies.

hint: Creates spirit clones to attack enemies.
description: Split into elemental spirits to attack multiple enemies simultaneously.
The target's damage taken is reduced by 20% for 12 seconds.

hint: Powerful healing over time to all nearby allies.
description: Heals all nearby group members every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.
Your skin becomes as tough as bark, reducing all damage you take by 20% and preventing damage from delaying your spellcasts. Lasts 8 sec.

hint: Absorbs fatal damage and heals you.
description: Reduces all damage taken by 20%, and if you fall below 20% health, you will instantly heal for 50% of maximum health.

hint: Summons an elemental ally to tank.
description: Calls forth an Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for a short time.
Teleports the caster to their home location.

hint: Teleport back to your hearthstone location.
description: Returns you to your hearthstone location. Slight chance of failure.
Allows allies to cast a major movement ability that is normally on cooldown.

hint: Get somewhere in a short cast
description: Teleports the caster to Warspear, the Horde base on Ashran.

hint: Get somewhere in a short cast
description: Teleports the caster to Stormshield, the Alliance base on Ashran.

hint: Summons a toy train to annoy people.
description: Place a toy train set that attracts the attention of nearby players and causes them to /train emote.
Blasts enemies near the caster for Frost damage and freezes them in place for 8 seconds.

hint: Turns the enemy into a sheep.
description: Transforms the enemy into a sheep, incapacitating them for 50 seconds. Damage will cancel the effect.

hint: Instant heal and a heal over time.
description: Heals a friendly target instantly and applies a heal over time effect.
Shields you with ice, absorbing damage for 1 minute.

hint: Coats your weapon to deal extra damage over time.
description: Coats your weapon with poison that has a chance to inflict extra Nature damage.
Thrusts with your off-hand weapon to apply an instant poison effect.
Brings all dead party and raid members back to life with 35% health and mana.

hint: Redirect your threat to your tank.
description: Redirects all threat you cause to a friendly target for 8 seconds.

hint: Blast your enemy with lunar energy.
description: Call down a burst of energy, causing Arcane damage to the target.
Teleport to the entrance to Ara-Kara, City of Echoes.
Teleport to the entrance to Plaguefall.
Teleport to the entrance to The Azure Vault.
Teleport to the entrance to the Temple of the Jade Serpent..
Teleport to the entrance to Skyreach.
Teleport to the entrance to Throne of the Tides.
Teleport to the entrance to Mists of Tirna Scithe.
Teleport to the entrance to Darkflame Cleft.
Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing yourself and 5 injured allies in a 30 yd cone in front of you.
Divert spiritual energy, healing an ally. Jumps to injured allies within 30 yds when empowered.

hint: Click for long dot, hold for short dot.
description: Inhale, stoking your inner flame. Release to exhale, burning enemies in a cone in front of you, reduced beyond 5 targets. Empowering causes more of the damage to be dealt immediately instead of over time.
Wrap an ally with temporal energy, healing them and causing your next healing spell to cast an additional time on that ally at 70% of normal healing.
Send a flickering flame towards your target.

hint: Healing over time, bigger if more damage taken.
description: Reverse an ally's injuries.
Grow a bulb from the Emerald Dream at an ally's location. After 1.5 sec, heal up to 3 injured allies within 10 yds.
Increase your 4 nearest allies' primary stat by 5% of your own, and cause you to deal 20% more damage, for 10 sec.
Protect an ally with 15 explosive dragonscales, increasing their Armor by 20% of your own.
Grant an ally the gift of foresight, increasing their critical strike chance by 3%.

hint: Increase duration of a specific effect you cause.
description: Increases the duration of your active Ebon Might effects by 1 sec.
Cause a violent eruption beneath an enemy's feet, dealing Volcanic damage split between them and nearby enemies.

hint: Dash with movespeed and cast while moving.
description: Launch yourself and gain 30% increased movement speed for 6 sec. Allows Evoker spells to be cast while moving. Does not affect empowered spells.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Tear into an enemy with a blast of blue magic, inflicting Spellfrost damage over 3 sec, and slowing their movement speed by 50% for 3 sec.

hint: Increase enemy damage taken from you.
description: Exhale bolts / a bolt of concentrated power from your mouth that cracks the target's defenses, increasing the damage they take from you by 20% for 4 sec.
Fire a shot that tears through your enemy, causing them to bleed. Sends your pet into a frenzy.
Sends you and your pet into a rage.

hint: Increase enemy damage taken from you.
description: Apply (Ability) to the target, causing the target to always be seen and tracked by the Hunter.
Give the command to kill.
Fires several missiles, hitting your current target and all enemies within 10 yards.
A powerful aimed shot that deals.
Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode.
You and your pet leap to the target and strike it as one.
Hurl a bomb at the target exploding for Fire damage in a cone and coating enemies in wildfire.

hint: More damage based on arcane charges.
description: Launches bolts of arcane energy at the enemy target.
Each Arcane Charge increases damage by 60% and mana cost by 100%, and reduces cast time by 8%.
Calls down a series of 7 icy comets on and around the target.
Launches an orb of swirling ice up to 40 yds.

hint: Short cast, can use while moving
description: Scorches an enemy.

hint: Instant cast, always crit if Fire
description: Blasts the enemy for fire damage.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder.
Smash a keg of brew on the target. Grants Shuffle.
Kick with a blast of Chi energy,.
Breathe fire on targets in front of you.
For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased.

hint: Hit all targets infront of you very fast
description: Pummels all targets in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.

hint: Requires other abilities to be on cooldown
description: Performs a devastating whirling upward strike. Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.
Surrounds the target with healing mists.
Kick up a powerful gust of wind.
Unleashes a powerful weapon strike that deals Holy damage to an enemy target and has a chance to reset Hammer of Wrath.
Instantly strikes all nearby enemies within 8 yards, dealing Holy damage and healing up to three allies for a portion of the damage dealt.
Fires a hammer at the target, dealing Holy damage and applying the Judgment debuff to increase damage taken.
Consecrates the ground beneath you, dealing Holy damage every second to enemies standing in the area.

hint: Cast main paladin ability on many targets
description: Sends out a wave of holy energy that strikes multiple nearby targets for Holy damage.
Shields a friendly target, absorbing damage.
Launches bolts of holy light that heal allies or damage enemies over a short duration.
Transforms into Voidform, unleashing a burst of shadow energy that deals damage and enhances your abilities.
Places a healing effect on a target that heals them and then jumps to another wounded ally after healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your next 3 spell casts by 7 sec.

hint: Increase healing and overhealing is useful
description: Increases your healing done by 20% and causes 70% of overhealing on players to be redistributed to up to 4 nearby allies for 15 sec.
Grants you a random selection of combat buffs to enhance your next few attacks.
Fires a pistol at the target, dealing physical damage.
Carve a deathmark into an enemy, dealing Bleed damage over 16 sec. While marked your Garrote, Rupture, and Lethal poisons applied to the target are duplicated, dealing 100% of normal damage.
Finishing move that drives your poisoned blades in deep, dealing instant Nature damage and increasing your poison application chance by 30%. Damage and duration increased per combo point.
Finishing move that disembowels the target, causing damage per combo point.
Invoke ancient symbols of power, generating 40 Energy and increasing damage done by 10% for 10 sec..
Strikes the target with both weapons, dealing Nature damage.
Unleash a devastating storm around yourself. Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Heals a friendly target and then jumps to additional injured allies for diminishing amounts.
Burns the enemy's soul, dealing Fire damage and applying Immolate.

hint: Long cast, big damage. Pyroblast for Warlock.
description: Unleashes a bolt of chaotic energy that always critically strikes, dealing Chaos damage.
Afflicts the target with a Curse of Agony, dealing damage over time.
Calls down a demonic meteor full of Wild Imps which burst forth to attack the target.
Attempts to finish off a foe.
Transforms you into an unstoppable avatar of war, increasing Strength for a short duration.
Claps the ground, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and reducing their movement speed.

hint: Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
description: Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies.
Continuously deal. Frost damage every 1 sec to enemies in a cone in front of you, until your Runic Power is exhausted. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.
A brutal attack.
Strikes an enemy for physical damage and heals you for a portion of damage you have taken.

hint: Big damage beam from your head
description: Unleashes a beam of demonic energy from both eyes, damaging all enemies in front of you.
Throw a glaive enhanced with the essence of consumed souls at your target.
Unleash the fel within you, damaging enemies directly in front of you.

hint: Consume souls and deal damage depending on amount
description: Consume up to 5 available Soul Fragments then explode, damaging nearby enemies.
Creates a circle of healing flowers that restore health to allies standing within it over time.
Heals the target over time.
Hurls a blast of energy at the enemy, dealing Nature damage.
Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting 10% haste for 15 sec.
Sweeps your attack across all nearby enemies, dealing damage and applying a bleed effect.
Strike with the might of Ursoc. Physical damage to your target and to all other enemies in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Rakes the target, dealing initial Physical damage and causing bleed damage over time.
Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.
(Ability) heals you for 1% of your maximum health and grants you Essence of the Blood Queen, increasing your Haste by 1.0%, up to 5.0% for 20 sec..
An unholy strike that Physical damage and Shadow damage, and causes 1 Festering Wound to burst.
Celestial Alignment] blasts all enemies in a targeted area and applies Stellar Flare to them..
